### Routine

**Load:**

```{r,eval=FALSE}
# load
setwd("./Developing/Roxie/")
library(workflowr)
```

**WorkflowR publish:**

```{r,eval=FALSE}
# workflowR publish
wflow_publish("./src/*.Rmd")
```

**Cleanup:**

```{r,eval=FALSE}
# cleanup environment
rm(list = ls())
```

**Git commit and push:**

```{bash,eval=FALSE}
# git pull
#mkdir ./Developing/Roxie/
#cd ./Developing/Roxie/
#git init
#git pull git@github.com:chenh19/Roxie.git

# git push
#cd ./Developing/Roxie/
#git remote add origin git@github.com:chenh19/Roxie.git
git commit -a -m "update"
git add --all
git commit -a -m "update"
git push -u origin main
```
